subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Duke overcame a six-goal halftime deficit but could not convert two shots to tie the score in the final seven seconds of the N.C.A.A. men’s lacrosse title game against Johns Hopkins.
snippet: Duke overcame a six-goal halftime deficit but could not convert two shots to tie the score in the final seven seconds of the N.C.A.A. men’s lacrosse title game against Johns Hopkins.
